oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Polk’s Official Nashville Arrow Street Guide, 1954
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1954 publication of Polk’s Official Nashville Arrow Street Guide, “a complete city guide by the publishers of the City Directory.” The Index to Contents: Abbreviations -- Air Line Companies -- Air Service, Chartered -- Airports -- Alphabetical list of Streets -- Asylums -- Auditoriums and Halls -- Buildings, Office and Public -- Bus and Coach Lines -- Bus Stations -- Capital Grounds -- Cemeteries -- Churches -- Clubs, Civic -- Clubs, Country and Private -- Coach Lines -- Colleges -- Country Clubs -- Dispensaries -- Fire Departments -- Golf Courses, Public -- Halls -- Hermitage -- Historical Points of Interest -- Homes and Asylums -- Forms part of the Publications - Booklets Collection. 1 booklet.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Central business districts--Tennessee--Nashville; Buildings--Tennessee--Nashville

Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville and Davidson County (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)--Social life and customs; Nashville (Tenn.)--Buildings, structures, etc.; Tennessee--Capital and capitol
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
